summary: Adds a book that helps you find the constellations!
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod which was influenced by a mod on the Nexus that makes the constellations more noticeable in the night sky.

[u]What it does:[/u]
Adds a book entitled \"The Astronomy of Tamriel\" to the Winterhold College, and all the major cities that helps you find the constellations in the sky. I don\'t want to spoil it too much, so just open the book and find out for yourself ;). The books are located in the library (naturally) and the Court Wizard rooms ~ well, more like where the Arcane tables are at.

Also, the books in Skyrim are weird because they follow basic HTML coding, but you don\'t know when a page starts or ends. As a result, the bottom of some pictures got cut off. I would love to have each page look like \"The Ritual\" page, but alas, I don\'t know how. And don\'t say use pagebreak code, because that sent everything on the right pages - the book would be well over 14 pages!

[u]Mods that go good with this:[/u]
Enhanced Night Skyrim (A must have for anyone)
SpookyJs Slightly Improved Constellations (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1832)

[u]Incompatibilies:[/u]
Any mod that alters the area in which the books are placed. I use a lot of mods, and none alter the areas; so for now, there shouldn\'t be any.

[u]Special Thanks:[/u]
SpookyJ
(For pointing out that the Mage is a sort of \"North Star\" - and getting me to make this mod through mutual interests)
CptJoker71
(He made Enhanced Night Skyrim)
Bethesda
(I hear they made Skyrim)

[u]Any other information that keeps me from copyright stuff?[/u]
The pictures of the constellations came from the Skyrim Wiki.
The map was made be me in photoshop.
The text was written by me.

[u]Permissions:[/u]
Pretty much the same as every other mod. Don\'t do stuff with the mod without my permission (except download it...), source me after I give you permission, blah blah all that jazz.
author: vertex23
